org.michailov.async.io

Class AsyncRingBufferWatcher<TRingBuffer extends RingBuffer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.michailov.async.AsyncAgent
      • org.michailov.async.io.AsyncRingBufferWatcher<TRingBuffer>

  • public class AsyncRingBufferWatcher<TRingBuffer extends RingBuffer>
extends AsyncAgent
    Asynchronous watcher of a RingBuffer. Fires the given callback when there are items available for reading.
    See Also:
    WhenReady, AsyncAgent, RingBuffer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AsyncRingBufferWatcher(TRingBuffer ringBuffer, java.util.function.Consumer<TRingBuffer> onAvailableToRead, AsyncOptions asyncOptions)
      Constructs an AsyncCharDecoder instance over the given ring buffers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void action()
      "action" function that invokes the onAvailableToRead callback synchronously.
      protected boolean done()
      "done" predicate that returns true when this async agent wants to quit the current async loop.
      TRingBuffer getRingBuffer()
      Returns the watched ring buffer.
      boolean isEOF()
      Checks whether this watcher has reached EOF of the watched ring buffer.
      protected boolean ready()
      "ready" predicate that returns true when items can be read from the watched ring buffer.

      • Methods inherited from class org.michailov.async.AsyncAgent

        applyAsync, isIdle, setIdle, setIdleAndThrow, startApplyLoopAsync

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AsyncRingBufferWatcher

        public AsyncRingBufferWatcher(TRingBuffer ringBuffer,
                              java.util.function.Consumer<TRingBuffer> onAvailableToRead,
                              AsyncOptions asyncOptions)
        Constructs an AsyncCharDecoder instance over the given ring buffers.
        Parameters:
        ringBuffer - RingBuffer to watch.
        onAvailableToRead - A callback to invoke when there are items available to read from the ring buffer.
        asyncOptions - AsyncOptions to use for all async operations.

    • Method Detail

      • getRingBuffer

        public TRingBuffer getRingBuffer()
        Returns the watched ring buffer.
        Returns:
        The watched ring buffer.

      • isEOF

        public boolean isEOF()
        Checks whether this watcher has reached EOF of the watched ring buffer.
        Returns:
        true iff EOF has been reached or an exception has been encountered.

      • ready

        protected boolean ready()
        "ready" predicate that returns true when items can be read from the watched ring buffer.
        Overrides:
        ready in class AsyncAgent
        Returns:
        Derived classes should override this method to return true iff it is time to execute AsyncAgent.action().

      • done

        protected boolean done()
        "done" predicate that returns true when this async agent wants to quit the current async loop.
        Overrides:
        done in class AsyncAgent
        Returns:
        Derived classes should override this method to return true iff it is time for the loop to stop.

      • action

        protected void action()
        "action" function that invokes the onAvailableToRead callback synchronously.
        Overrides:
        action in class AsyncAgent
